bill.title: Public utilities; revise jurisdiction of Public Service Commission to include certain technological services.
bill.description: An Act To Revise The Jurisdiction Of The Public Service Commission To Include Certain Video Services; To Amend Section 77-3-3, Mississippi Code Of 1972, To Remove The Terms "video Services," "voice Over Internet Protocol Services," "wireless Services," "commercial Mobile Services" And "internet Protocol-enabled Services" Which Were Excluded From The Jurisdiction Of The Commission; To Amend Section 77-3-35, Mississippi Code Of 1972, To Provide That The Commission May Only Regulate The Rates, Terms And Conditions Of Certain Switched Access Services And Single-line Flat Rate Voice Communication Services; To Provide That An Incumbent Local Exchange Carrier Shall Provide Primary Single-line Flat Rate Voice Communication Service To The Premises Of Permanent Residence Or Business Within Its Franchised Service Territory, If The Cost To The Requesting Party Does Not Exceed A Certain Amount; To Provide That Certain Telecommunication Utilities Shall Only Be Required To File Financial Or Service Quality Information That Is Required To Be Filed With The Federal Communications Commission; And For Related Purposes.
